title: Ambient Video Game Music - Lava Fields
description: Unveiling a sizzling collection of 10 ambience packs designed to immerse players in the searing landscapes of recently erupted volcanoes.
longDescription:
Unveiling a sizzling collection of 10 ambience packs designed to immerse players in the searing landscapes of recently erupted volcanoes. This collection offers game developers the tools to transform their gaming experiences into a journey through earth's most powerful displays of nature.


Each pack in this collection embodies the ferocious essence of an active volcanic field. They are rich with the resonant sounds of bubbling hot lava flowing past, giving players an auditory front-row seat to nature's raw power. The packs encompass the range of tones and frequencies that lava produces, from deep bass rumbles of underground magma movement to the lighter sizzling and crackling of surface flows.


Moreover, each pack is accentuated with the ambient noise that surrounds such a cataclysmic event. You'll hear the distant rumble of the earth, the whistle of heated air, and the hiss of molten rock meeting cooler surfaces, further enhancing the authenticity of your volcanic landscape.


Tying this awe-inspiring soundscape together is a masterfully composed track. This soundtrack weaves together the many unique sounds of the volcanic field, echoing the visceral power and unpredictability of these geological phenomena.


This collection is a one-of-a-kind resource for game developers looking to create realistic and intense volcanic-themed environments. It captures the unparalleled spectacle of an erupting volcano in audio form, allowing your players to experience the raw and untamed power of nature in their gaming journey. The end result is a gaming experience that's as intense and captivating as standing on the edge of a volcanic crater.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--


Music Preview 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZDn6JYe9d3I

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ROgEojkqydw


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
